affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "gotinfo" );
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "COL7" );

	task ( "vergara" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/mullins/col7/03vergara.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "COL7_003" );
	}

	do ( "vergara" );
}
